f21as

Class DepotMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • f21as.DepotMan

  • public class DepotMan
extends java.lang.Object
    DepotMan class runs the parcel man program. It reads the lists and initiates the parcel collection simulation then writes the output report.
    Since:
    February, 2013
    Version:
    61
    Author:
    Amjad Bari, Wayne Muller, Sanaa Diab

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DepotMan() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean collectParcel()
      collectParcel() is the collection simulation method which takes one customer at a time and checks the parcel they are claiming, calculates the fees and receives the payment.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      boolean popCustomerList()
      popCustomerList() reads the customer.txt file
      boolean popParcelList()
      popParcelList() reads the parcel.txt file
      void writeParcelReport()
      writeParcelReport() writes the parcel collection results of the program in parcelReport.txt

    • Method Detail

      • popCustomerList

        public boolean popCustomerList()
        popCustomerList() reads the customer.txt file
        Returns:
        true if file reading was successful or false if any problems issued
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if file cannot be read

      • popParcelList

        public boolean popParcelList()
        popParcelList() reads the parcel.txt file
        Returns:
        true if file reading was successful or false if any problems issued
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if file cannot be read

      • writeParcelReport

        public void writeParcelReport()
        writeParcelReport() writes the parcel collection results of the program in parcelReport.txt
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if file cannot be read

      • collectParcel

        public boolean collectParcel()
        collectParcel() is the collection simulation method which takes one customer at a time and checks the parcel they are claiming, calculates the fees and receives the payment. This process is printing on console.
        Returns:
        false at end of operation

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
